meico.app.gui

Class StatusPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent

              • meico.app.gui.StatusPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    class StatusPanel
extends javafx.scene.layout.HBox
    This class creates a status bar.
    Author:
    Axel Berndt
